segments.text: Ladies and gentlemen , now we are in the National Forest Park .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The stone is a prehistoric log . It was turned to stone millions of years ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have Ginkgo trees here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We don't have them here , I'm afraid . Ginkgo trees grow well only in cold weather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are these trees opposite to the pine trees ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are poplar trees . They are widely used in our lives .
segments.speaker: S1
